title: Profits > People, CharCUTErie  12.14.20
itunes:title: Profits > People, CharCUTErie  12.14.20
description:
In episode 778, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by comedian Michael Kosta to discuss coronavirus relief, the attorney of general of Texas, all the news out of Disney this week, Britney Spears and Backstreet Boys dropped a new song together, squirrel tables, the Zorro reboot, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Coronavirus relief talks stall as liability issue foils negotiators
  2. FBI issues subpoena for Texas AG records after whistleblower allegations: report
  3. Chadwick Boseman Can't Be Replaced and Won't Be in Black Panther 2—Plus, Other Highlights From Disney's Huge Investor Event
  4. Holy 2000, Britney Spears and Backstreet Boys released a new song together
  5. Everyone Gather Round the Squirrel Table. (Chipmunks Too!)
  6. NBC developing modern-day, gender-swapped Zorro reboot
  7. WATCH: Jonah Yano - Delicate (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
